title: Noam Chomsky on Big Left Media promoting Oliver Stone's JFK Assassination Conspiracies
description:
Green and Red co-host Bob Buzzanco talks with Noam Chomsky about big lefty media outlets (Jacobin, Counterpunch, Majority Report) promoting Oliver Stone's JFK assassination theories. 

Part of a bigger interview on Oliver Stone's "JFK Revisited," the war in Vietnam, Jan 6, politics in America. Found on all your podcast audio listening platforms, our YouTube channel and our Facebook video page.
